hero.title: Find Your Next Teaching Job in India
hero.subtitle: Discover thousands of opportunities in schools and colleges near you.
hero.postResume: Post your resume - It only takes a few seconds

jobDetails.selectJob: Select a job to see details
jobDetails.selectJobDescription: Your future career is just one click away. Click on a job posting to view the full description and apply.

messages.title: Messages
messages.selectConversation: Select a conversation to start messaging

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.welcomeDescription: Once you start your job search, we'll notify you here about application status, messages from schools, interview tips, and new jobs that match your profile.

types.interviewRequest: {{schoolName}} has invited you to an interview
types.newMessage: You have a new message from {{schoolName}}
types.applicationRejected: Your application for {{jobTitle}} was not selected at this time
types.offerReceived: {{schoolName}} has sent you an offer letter!

emptyDescriptions.saved: Save interesting jobs to apply later.
emptyDescriptions.applied: Start applying to jobs that match your profile.
emptyDescriptions.interviews: When a school invites you for an interview, you will see all the details here.
emptyDescriptions.offers: Job offers from schools will appear here for your review.
emptyDescriptions.hired: Your successful job placements will be shown here.
emptyDescriptions.archived: Jobs you've archived will appear here.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.visibilityDescription: Allow your profile to be discoverable by schools searching for teachers. We will never share your contact information without your permission.

account.title: Account settings
account.closeAccountDescription: This will permanently delete your account and all associated data.

notifications.title: Notification settings
notifications.jobAlertsDescription: Get daily or weekly emails with jobs that match your profile.
notifications.whatsappDescription: Receive real-time updates on your application status.
notifications.schoolMessagesDescription: Notify me when a school sends you a message.

privacy.title: Privacy settings
privacy.discoverabilityDescription: Allow schools to find your profile when they search for teachers. Your contact details will remain private.
privacy.requestDataDescription: Download a copy of all the personal data you have shared with Teacher-Connect.

howItWorks.title: Everything you need to make great hires

testimonials.title: Trusted by Schools Across India
testimonials.quote: Teacher-Connect helped us find a qualified Physics PGT in just two weeks. The process was seamless.
